titleStmt.title: The name altar, or thysiastērion, anciently given to the holy table A common-place, or theologicall discourse, in a colledge chappell more than two yeares since. By Joseph Mede B.D. and fellow of Christs Colledge in Cambridge.
titleStmt.author: Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: The word "thysiastērion" on the title page is in Greek characters.
